skills.name: Deadly Blow
skills.description: Unleashes a fatal blow on an enemy, disturbing the target's HP recovery for 2 turns with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.name: Check and Destroy
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times and weakens the Attack Power and the Defense for 2 turns with a 75% chance with each attack. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.14*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Decline
skills.description: Protects all allies from death for 1 turn. Removes all harmful effects and gains immunity for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Endure
skill_effect.description: Monster temporarily cannot be killed as HP cannot go below 1

skill_effect.name: Immunity
skill_effect.description: Monster is immune to all negative status effects
